Table of Contents

Class BindableObject

Namespace
Vts
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements the INotifyPropertyChangedPlus interface and exposes a RaisePropertyChanged method for derived classes to raise the PropertyChange event. The event arguments created by this class are cached to prevent managed heap fragmentation.

Adapted from Josh Smith's post: http://joshsmithonwpf.wordpress.com/2007/08/29/a-base-class-which-implements-inotifypropertychanged/

Added SetProperty method to simplify set operations. Modified "RaisePropertyChanged" to "OnPropertyChanged" to work with INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, enabling compatibility with the DependsOn attribute and PropertyDependencyManager class.

[DataContract]
public abstract class BindableObject : INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, INotifyPropertyChanged

default constructor, protected version

protected BindableObject()

Methods

AfterPropertyChanged(string)

Derived classes can override this method to execute logic after a property is set. The base implementation does nothing.

protected virtual void AfterPropertyChanged(string propertyName)

Parameters

propertyName string

The property which was changed.

GetPropertyChangedEventArgs(string)

Returns an instance of PropertyChangedEventArgs for the specified property name

public static PropertyChangedEventArgs GetPropertyChangedEventArgs(string propertyName)

Parameters

propertyName string

The name of the property for which to create event args

Returns

PropertyChangedEventArgs

An instance of PropertyChangedEventArgs for the specified property

OnPropertyChanged(string)

Attempts to raise the PropertyChanged event, and invokes the virtual AfterPropertyChanged method, regardless of whether the event was raised or not.

public void OnPropertyChanged(string propertyName)

Parameters

propertyName string

The property which was changed

PropertyChanged

Raised when a public property of this object is set
